recommendations: LinkedIn User ‚ÄúIt's a learning experience to work with Nikhil, for you get the opportunity to delve deep into client problem statements to come out with best possible realistic solutions. His ability to question, challenge based on his well earned and learned questions and opinions ranging from technology to policies enlightens you. His entrepreneurial abilities really make it interesting to engage with him on emerging technologies and use cases. ‚Äù

publications: [{"title":"Derisking the future of India Inc. - Business continuity planning: Need of the hour for India Inc.","subtitle":"CII / KPMG","date":"Feb 2015","description":"Contributed to the chapter Business continuity planning: Need of the hour for India Inc."},{"title":"SMAC - The paradigm shift : Creating future of the Enterprise","subtitle":"KPMG and TechSenate (ExpressComputers)","date":"September 12, 2014","description":"Social, Mobile, Analytics, and Cloud; the quadruplet popularised as the acronym SMAC are continuing the next wave of IT transformation which began with Web2.0. Interestingly, each of these four pillars touch every aspect within the organisation. Securing information handled by SMAC technologies and addressing privacy concerns resulting from their usage is as important today as is aiding the adoption of SMAC. As SMAC technologies get absorbed in the IT fabric of organizations, challenges for organizations will change from driving adoption to balancing benefits realization with the security and governance concerns."},{"title":"Mobility - The Next Wave","subtitle":"Compact.nl","date":"December 19, 2013","description":"Challenges of Enterprise Mobility and overcoming them to achieve Enterprise Mobility Enablement"},{"title":"Making Emerging Technologies a Boardroom Agenda","subtitle":"Computer Society of India, KPMG","date":"February 1, 2013","description":"Enterprise Mobility, Cloud, Big Data, Social Media "},{"title":"The Indian Cloud Revolution","subtitle":"Confederation of Indian Industry","date":"May 2012","description":"Contributed to parts of the publication dealing with Data Security and Privacy, Cloud Ecosystem, Developmental opportunities presented by the Cloud and Conceptual Framework for a Cloud Policy in India"},{"title":"FICCI Frames 2012: Digital Dawn - The metamorphosis begins","subtitle":"FICCI Frames","date":"Mar 2012","description":"Contributor to the chapter 'Technologies Impacting The M&E Industry'"},{"title":"FICCI Frames 2011: Hitting the High Notes","subtitle":"FICCI Frames","date":"Mar 2011","description":"Contributor to the chapter 'Performance and Technology- Creativity is not enough'"}]
